puzzles.puzzleName: Today at the start of class
What is at the Signal Hut
They also sell things for MAGiE
So Proti gets out before it is too late
But it is just a robot
It must be able to writeos
The Signal Hut has a demo computer
The demo computer has many programs
The paper is a help sheet
Proti swipeos the card through MAGiE
Proti guesses that the gibberish is a program
Each letter is exactly five bits
And A is the first bit
Now we set the fourth bit
